title: When Drones Leap Into U.S. Airspace, Attention Turns To Herding Them
teaser: If drones are ever going to fly safely near manned airplanes, these unmanned craft will need to sense and avoid objects and danger. But the FAA's next generation of radar may not be up to the task.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
